income_messages:
From: w*******************g@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-30 10:00:41
SUBJECT: Attention: Beneficiary
Attention: Beneficiary
Owing to the inability of the past regime to settle Foreign
Contractors and inheritance claimants,The World bank group under the
watch of Mr.David Malpass recently signed into law the "New" Deduction
Policy of Charges/Fees and has mandated to Enforce by International
Law the Debt settlement and Release of all foreign liabilities before
the end of this second quarter of 2022 Fiscal Year.
After our general election in Which the World bank mandated the
affected governments to make sure that all foreign deals delayed
during their past regimes are settled because it is part of the World
bank Manifesto and this new policy will enable all foreign payment
beneficiaries secure the release of their funds after relevant
charges/fees are deducted from source.
The imminent arrangements as well as secret plans to apprehend all the
former corrupt officers has been approved by the committee and
investigation panel revealed unnecessary use of bureaucratic
procedures, imposition of unauthorized fees and diversion of
beneficiaries funds to accounts not authorized by them thereby
deliberately delayed Foreign Payment and gross unofficial misconduct.
We need to do this faster to wipe out corruption lingering during the
past regimes and I bear the responsibility to make history and redeem
Countries from bad image.
Finally, It becomes paramount to inform you that based on the details
contained in your payment file forwarded to my office,your payment
amount Eight Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars (USD:$8,500,000.00)
is among the ‘Priority Category’ which implies your claim is long
over-due.You are therefore advised to contact Us urgently so that the
payment modalities will be communicated to you in transparency.
This arrangement will authorize relevant charges withholding the
release of your payment to be deducted and your claim released within
72hrs
Thank you
Mr. David Malpass
The president and head of World Bank Group
https: // president.worldbankgroup.org/en/president
Website www. worldbank.org

forward your details to commence the work procedures

Attention: Beneficiary
Owing to the inability of the past regime to settle Foreign
